body.name: Giantex Lazy Chair with Ottoman, Accent Sofa Chair with Folding Footrest, Side Storage Pocket, Upholstered Leisure Lounge Armchair with Stool for Bedroom, Living Room, Office, Blue
features: [Elevating Seating Comfort]: Filled with soft PP cotton, the lazy sofa chair brings a cloud-like experience, allowing you to sink into a cozy embrace every time you sit down. And the durable polyester fabric cover also withstands everyday wear, ensuring long-lasting use.

[2 In 1 Foldable Footrest]: The comfy accent chair comes with a footrest, on which you can rest your legs for relaxation. What’s more, the footrest also doubles up as an extra stool, offering additional seating as needed. When not using it, you can quickly fold it up for easy storage.

[User-friendly Details]: Designed with sturdy metal tubes and non-slip foot pads, the lazy chair is firm and stable enough to hold up to 330 lbs. Besides, the comfortable head pillow well supports your head. And side storage pocket helps hold phones, newspapers, books, etc.

[Multi-scene Application]: With its sleek design, our lazy sofa chair with footrest complements any place, be it your study, living room, bedroom, or balcony. It becomes your go-to spot, where you can enjoy reading, watching TV, playing games, taking a nap etc.

[Easy Assembly in 6 Steps]: The leisure sofa chair with footrest is easy to assemble by the following steps: 1. Connect the supporting tubes; 2. Place the cover on; 3. Tie the buckle; 4. Zip up the cover; 5. Fix with the hook and loop fasteners; 6. Secure with fixing straps.
body.description: Description: Curl yourself up on our lazy chair and footrest set! This lounge chair with a footstool offers a perfect spot for you to rest. The oversized ergonomic seat, soft head pillow and armrests allow you to completely relax. What’s more, the footstool provides extra support for your legs and feet, so that you can find the perfect position for maximum comfort. Designed with durable polyester fabric cover and soft PP cotton filling, the accent chair is not only comfortable, but also durable for years of constant use. The heavy-duty metal frame is sturdy enough, ensuring high load capacity. And the foldable footstool with a removable cushion can also be used as an additional seat when needed. Features: Accent chair with footrest gives whole body support Footstool with dual use: footrest or additional seat The footrest folds up easily for compact storage Cushion with straps can be securely fixed on the stool Durable polyester fabric cover for long-lasting use Soft PP cotton filling takes comfort to the next level Comes with a side pocket to store phone or books Metal frame with non-slip foot pads for high stability Perfect addition to living room, bedroom, balcony, etc. Easy to assemble under the step-to-step instruction Specifications: Color: Beige/Grey/Blue Materials: Polyester, Metal, PP Cotton Dimension of Sofa Chair: 29.5" x 32" x 37.5" (W x D x H) Dimension of Ottoman: 16.5" x 16.5" x 19" (L x W x H) Seat Height: 20.5" Total Net Weight: 23 lbs Weight Capacity of Sofa Chair: 330 lbs Weight Capacity of Footrest: 110 lbs Package Includes: 1 x Sofa Chair 1 x Ottoman 1 x Cushion 1 x Instruction

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: OMG! We needed extra seating over the holidays because all three adult children brought a partner to stay. I ordered this inexpensive chair to put in a small spot next to a piano. It comes in a box, is easy to assemble and disassemble, and is inexpensive. IT WAS THE FAVORITE SEAT FOR EVERYONE!! The smallest person (5’) up to the largest (6’4”) found it to be VERY comfortable! I mistakenly thought the cover could be removed and washed (hence the beige color) so keep that in mind. This chair looks good and is very comfy, especially with the ottoman. EXCELLENT PURCHASE!!! I thought that with so many positive reviews and free return option, it was worth a try. DEFINITELY A GOOD CHOICE! I have already gotten my money’s worth after only a week! HAH, just realized when I read the product description that it has a cell phone pocket on the side! Fits my phone in its leather case easy peasy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY TO BUILD. Use logic. Affordable and comfy!
reviews.reviewText: DARK GREY chair was amazing. The value for money is pretty good. Its MEDIUM SIZED but looks great. I think assembly is MEDIUM EASY. It can be kind of confusing but its pretty simple just follow the directions . Totally a must have!! Im really glad it was not hard to build. Took me like 20 minutes to assemble alone and i am also a DUMMY LOL. DO NOT BUY IKEA CHAIRS. BUY THIS INSTEAD. Super stable and I LOVE THIS CHAIR. Looks super decorative and is soo comfy.Must buy!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice versatile chair
reviews.reviewText: I needed a chair that I could use in my bedroom to read by the window, but that I could easily move to my living room for extra guest seating. This is a perfect light-use chair. It looks nice, and is VERY comfortable. It was easy to put together. The one con for me is that it feels a little "rickety" if you wiggle in it, but looking at how it is assembled, it doesn't seem like it could actually collapse. There is a stabilizing cross bar underneath that doesn't screw in, so I added some zip ties to keep it in place. If I had more room, I would definitely get a 2nd one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly comfortable and simple to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 14-year-old’s birthday and now I’m jealous — pretty sure I need one for my office too! Very comfy, nice fabric that doesn’t seem like it will stain easily, pretty blue color, and terrific option of the padded footstool. No logo anywhere (this must have been on previous versions?) and feels surprisingly sturdy when you sit in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is great as a lounge chair or for a gamer! I am using this as my office chair. Found myself nodding off a few times it is that comfortable. Very comfortable seating but not the greatest for lumbar support.As for weight bearing I would not recommend anyone over 225 lbs for stability reasons.Compared to others it’s priced just right.The material seems durable and easy to clean. The color is true to its picture.The size is average, but not overly sized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great reading chair
reviews.reviewText: Love this chair. Bought it for my daughter's room for her to read. Easy to assemble. Comfortable and very nice looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this chair for my son’s apartment. He love it! It’s so comfortable and easy-breezy to assemble. I’m glad I got it for him. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are AWESOME!
reviews.reviewText: Do you have kids? Do you have pets? Do you have a need for comfy furniture that won't break the bank and therefore won't upset you too much if the kids and/or pets ruin its pristine upholstery? Then buy these. I'm not kidding, buy these. Between our rather clumsy 10 year old who is prone to spilling anything and everything she touches (and yes, she's been told more than once that nail polish is NOT allowed on the couch!) and our two dogs who make a bee-line for the sofa to clean off their paws whenever it rains, we haven't yet had a couch last longer than three years. They've even managed to take out a pair of wing backs and a fair number of saucer chairs, because of COURSE we didn’t get those to try to keep the kid off the couch. OBVIOUSLY they were meant for the dogs to curl up in at night when we're in bed. After our most recent couch made its way to the curb last week with a lifespan of two and a half years, I decided we weren't going to waste even more money on yet another doomed sofa, at least not until our daughter is old enough that I no longer need to threaten to switch her back to sippy cups and/or I can find a slip cover that actually keeps the smell of wet dog from seeping into the cushions (I have yet to be successful in this endeavor). These chairs seemed cushiony enough not to kill our backs sitting in them and the blue looked like it would match the TV room (it does), so I decided to take a chance on them. And I am very happy that I did. They just arrived this afternoon and I've almost fallen asleep in mine twice already (it's been a long day). The tougher fabric has thus far withstood not only the condensation from my child's water bottle, but my overheated dogs' drool, with the added bonus that both dogs are quite confused by their construction and can't figure out how to get into them. There's no telling how long these will hold up, but even if it's only 6 months they will be well worth the money to give us something to sit on while we look for the next sofa/sectional/loveseat victim to introduce to the TV room. Seriously, if your family is hard on furniture, grab a couple of these. We are very, very pleased.
I ordered this as we needed a chair, but I was pleasantly surprised at how VERY comfortable this chair is. It is my new favourite.
Easy to assemble, nice, simple and comfy

This chair is easy to put together and comfortable. However I’m glad it was for my daughters room and not in a living room. It has this red tag on the front of it for EVERYONE to see. It doesn’t come off. I didn’t see it in any of the pictures but my chair showed up with it on.
Love the color. It’s really comfortable, it does have a little wobble when moving around in it
